TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP - Cypriot national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE ( in the “ TRNC ” ) . He was represented before ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) did not designate an Agent for the purposes of the proceedings before the ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant was the owner of CARDINAL plots of land ( plot nos . XCARDINAL/CARDINAL ECARDINAL - CARDINAL , CARDINAL and CARDINAL - CARDINAL ) situated along the east coast of LOC ( PERSON ) . Since DATE these plots have been used by the NORP military forces for a military base .

On DATE the applicant petitioned ORG of GPE requesting compensation for his land . On DATE he was informed that the “ NORP ” authorities had commenced the procedure to expropriate the land in question pursuant to ORG .

On DATE Notice no . CARDINAL was published in ORG of the “ NORP ” , pursuant to LAW . According to the LAW , plot nos . XCARDINAL/CARDINAL ECARDINAL CARDINAL , CARDINAL and ORG were to be compulsorily acquired for national security reasons . The ORG provided that any objections should be addressed to ORG within DATE of the publication .

On DATE Notice no . CARDINAL was published in ORG of the “ NORP ” , pursuant to LAW . According to this LAW , as there had been no objections , the Government ordered the compulsory acquisition of the plots of land referred to in Notice no . CARDINAL .
The applicant claims that he learned of the existence of Notice no . CARDINAL on DATE , verbally , from an official at the ORG office .
On DATE ORG sent an offer of compensation to the applicant , amounting to MONEY ( GBP ) to be converted into GPE liras .
On DATE the applicant filed an action for compensation with ORG , sitting as ORG ( PERSON ) .

During the proceedings , the applicant claimed that the market value of property in the area was MONEY and GBP CARDINAL per dönüm . The experts called by the applicant confirmed that the market value of the land in question was GBP CARDINAL per dönüm . The court also heard from the experts called by the defendant party , who in turn alleged that the market value was GBP CARDINAL per dönüm . The evaluation by the defendant party ’s experts was based on the declarations made to the ORG office . On DATE the Girne ORG rendered its decision . It expressed its concerns about the amount stated by the defendant party ’s experts , stating that buyers tended to undervalue their property at the ORG office in order to reduce the fees and charges . As a result , it awarded the applicant GBP CARDINAL per dönüm . In sum , the applicant was granted GBP CARDINAL ( MONEY ) by way of compensation for CARDINAL dönüms of land .
On DATE , considering the amount of compensation excessive , the Attorney General filed an appeal against this decision . The proceedings are still pending before ORG .
